subdisciplines.name: Community Engagement
subdisciplines.description: The practice of involving local residents, groups, and organizations in the news-making process to encourage public participation in local issues and solutions.

subdisciplines.name: Hyperlocal News Coverage
subdisciplines.description: The coverage of news and events within a specific geographic community, often by online-only news outlets.

subdisciplines.name: Collaborative Journalism
subdisciplines.description: The practice of working together with other news outlets or journalists to cover a story or community more comprehensively.
